control.description-key: Configuration-driven visualization control for charts, cards, and calendars

property.name: chartDefinition
property.description-key: Lookup to sprk_chartdefinition record. Takes precedence over static ID if both provided.

property.name: chartDefinitionId
property.description-key: Static GUID of sprk_chartdefinition record. Used when lookup is empty. Enables multiple charts per form.

property.name: contextFieldName
property.description-key: Field name to filter data by current record (e.g., sprk_regardingrecordid or _sprk_matterid_value). Shows only related records.

property.name: fetchXmlOverride
property.description-key: Per-deployment FetchXML query override. Takes highest priority over chart definition FetchXML and saved views.

property.name: width
property.description-key: Optional width in pixels. Used for MetricCard matrix card sizing (3:5 ratio). Default: auto-fill container.

property.name: justification
property.description-key: Content alignment: left (default), left-center, center, right-center, right. Use with columnPosition for multi-column coordination.

property.name: columnPosition
property.description-key: Position of this control in a multi-column layout (1-4). Controls edge padding removal so adjacent PCFs appear as one visual. 1=left edge, 2-3=middle, 4=right edge.

property.name: columns
property.description-key: Number of cards per row in MetricCard matrix layout. Card width = (container width - gaps) / columns. Default: auto based on data count.

property.name: valueFormatOverride
property.description-key: Override chart definition value format for this placement. Values: shortNumber, letterGrade, percentage, wholeNumber, decimal, currency.

property.name: showTitle
property.description-key: Show the chart definition name as a title above the visual. Default: hidden.

property.name: titleFontSize
property.description-key: Base font size for the title (e.g., 14px, 0.9rem). Scales responsively with card size.

property.name: showVersion
property.description-key: Show the version badge in the lower-left corner. Default: visible.

property.name: showToolbar
property.description-key: Show the chart toolbar with expand button

property.name: enableDrillThrough
property.description-key: Enable click interactions to drill into underlying data
